tokens.text: looks at players holding tradable items

generated_doNotEdit.title: Trade Interest Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to look at a player that is holding a tradable item.

fields.title: Carried Item Switch Time
fields.description: The max time in seconds that the trader will hold an item before attempting to switch for a different item that takes the same trade

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: The time in seconds before the trader can use this goal again

fields.title: Interest Time
fields.description: The max time in seconds that the trader will be interested with showing its trade items

fields.title: Remove Item Time
fields.description: The max time in seconds that the trader will wait when you no longer have items to trade

fields.title: Within Radius
fields.description: Distance in blocks this mob can be interested by a player holding an item they like

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
